entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 09:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then rain at times mixed with snow. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 9 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9 except plus 5 in onshore winds. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
